title: Local Players Selected To Play In 2015 Shrine Bowl
text:

The Game will be played December 19th in Post to Facebook Local Players Selected To Play In 2015 Shrine Bowl Greensboro, N.C.--Rosters were released this afternoon for the 2015 Shrine Bowl of the Carolinas. The Game will be played December 19th in  //on.wfmy.com/1Rr6VMd   Join the Conversation To   Local Players Selected To Play In 2015 Shrine Bowl WFMY Staff, WFMY 1:34 p.m. EDT October 5, 2015 Shrine Bowl Of The Carolinas (Photo: Shrine Bowl Of The Carolinas) 16 CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Greensboro, N.C.--Rosters were released this afternoon for the 2015 Shrine Bowl of the Carolinas. 
The Game will be played December 19th in Spartanburg, South Carolina. 
Nine local players were selected to represent North Carolina. 
*Nick Coe (DL) Asheboro 
*Chrishon Springs (LB) East Forsyth 
*John Lamot (Athlete) Eastern Alamance 
*Garrett Hooker (LB) Ledford 
*Divine Diable (WR) Mount Tabor 
*Kennedy McKoy (RB) North Davidson 
*Harrison Kiser (K) Page
